(d) general vibrations of a polyatomic molecule about its equilibrium position." Break it down and guide me through step by step.

value.Thoughts of Tutorbot: The student seems to have a good understanding of Simple Harmonic Motion and has correctly applied it to the provided scenario. I should confirm the student's answer and move on to the next part of the problem.
